value:
I worry my appearance is lacking the
decorum one requires to appear
before Askran royalty, but...$k$pWell, the young prince and princess
don't seem to mind.

Before I came here, I was embroiled
in a battle against my siblings and
some Hoshidan royals...$k$pIt was all over a ticket to a tropical
island. I won, of course. I have my
retainers to thank for that.

Does the Order of Heroes allow for
vacations? We'll take care of the
enemy. You go relax on the beach.$k$pIt...can be fun.

Tell me, $Nu...
Can you swim? If so, I would ask that
you teach me. Or, at the very least...$k$pTeach me how to float.

This water toy resembles an astral
dragon Corrin cared for. I call the toy
Lilith. You may do so as well.

Greetings from
$Nf. You want
to know if I'm going swimming?$k$pDon't be absurd. Everyone knows I
cannot swim.

Could it be I'm more suited to
fighting in a swimsuit?

Hm... Passable results for fighting
in such an outfit.

Has the heat dulled my senses?
I must redouble my efforts.

You have my gratitude. This will
be a fine summer thanks to you.

I am Xander, Crown Prince of Nohr.
I was at a beach practicing my
swimming technique, so...$k$pWell, I'm afraid your sudden
summoning caught me off guard.

Pardon my saying, but I've had this
on my mind for some time...$k$pIt's awfully bold of you to force a
crown prince such as myself to fight
in little more than a swimsuit.$k$pNo, no, I don't mean to sound upset.
On the contrary, in fact. I seldom get
the chance to feel free of my armor.$k$pAnd even more seldom do I feel so
free from the burdens of the crown.$k$pMy title of Crown Prince of Nohr
carries no weight in this realm.$k$pI can walk along clutching my water
toy Lilith and none give me a second
glance.$k$pI've experienced nothing like it before.
So, $Nu you
have my gratitude. $k$pThank you for an unforgettable
summer. I shall remain by your side
until I must return home.
せいっ
むんっ
おわっ
Lilith...!
Right where I want you!
Tropical attack!
Rot in a watery grave!
I cannot swim!
Back again...
Whew...
This garment lacks protection. That...concerns me.
This flotation device is my only defense against my greatest adversary. Sinking.
Sorting seashells... This one from that one... Good fun.
I was asked to compose a list categorizing every...beauty of the beach? Odd request.
I don't mean to scowl on a beach. I'm just concerned about things, that is all.
I left my retainers behind. Worrisome. Chaos is ever their companion.
Should you require fun, I highly recommend a tropical vacation.
Oh!
Hmm, hot.
Where is this sea?
